Commenti.Body: I like seeing the buildings lit up for Christmas, thanks for sharing.

I hate I'm not gonna see the Christmas building lit up in person, but this is just as good.

Thanks for sharing!
Moved away in 2019 and I have to say, I miss Birmingham.

I really like how they’ve done the lights on the children’s Hospital. Off-topic but I just found out that in many children’s hospitals across the country the window washers dress up like superheroes while they’re cleaning the windows. Go check it out on YouTube.
Lmao I think I know exactly what parking deck you’re at
Where is this, 2nd floor of Terrace appts?
Luv ❤️ my city around this tyme of year
